text:
[C] If this is in the Front Row Center Slot, this gains +3000 Power.
[A] [(1) Put a ::Hololive:: Character from Waiting Room to the bottom of your Clock] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 2 ::TRAIT:: Characters from among them, show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, and put the remaining cards to the Waiting Room.

[C] Character Opposite this cannot move to another Slot.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] During your turn, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this becomes Reversed in battle, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 2 or higher, you may Rest this. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[C] If this is in the Front Row Center Slot, this gains +1 Soul.
[A] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] When this attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library and put them on top of your Library in any order.

[C] All your other Characters gain the following ability. "[C] This cannot Side Attack."
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room, and this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of ::Hololive:: Characters among those cards.

[C] You cannot play Events or BACKUP from hand.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Draw Phase, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 1 or higher, you may return this to your hand. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] This cannot Side Attack.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +50 Soul for the turn.

[A] When you use BACKUP of this, if all your Characters are ::Hololive::, you may put the top card of your Library in Stock.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2000, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When your other ::Hololive:: Character attacks, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Hololive:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] When this attacks, if you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] ENCORE [Put the top card of your Library in your Clock]

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. During the turn this is placed from hand to the Stage, when the Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X = 1 + Level of that card. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] At the start of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1)] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, perform the following action. "Search your Library for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, reveal it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, choose a card in your hand, discard it to the Waiting Room, and Shuffle your Library."

[A] [(1) Discard a ::Hololive:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in your Waiting Room. If there were at least 1 Climax card among them, choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row, and that Character gets -1000 Power for the turn.
[A] [(1) Put this in Clock] When this becomes Reversed in Battle, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may move this to an empty Slot in the Front Row.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Character with "Korone" in name, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage,you may pay cost. If so, choose up to 1 Character with "Korone" in name from your Waiting Room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your Characters with "Korone" in name, and for the turn that Character gains +1000 Power.

[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may Send this to Memory. If so, at the start of your next Draw Phase, choose a "Fubuki Shirakami, Wish for a Future with You" in your Memory and put it in any Slot on the Stage.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 1 or lower, you may Reverse that Character.
[A] [Discard a Climax card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] During your turn, all your other ::Hololive:: Characters gain +1000 Power.
[A] When your Climax is placed in the Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[A] [Discard a card from hand to Waiting Room] When this card is placed from hand to Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a level 0 or lower Character in your Waiting Room and place it to any slot on the Stage.

[C] This gets -1 Level while on the Stage.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times Soul of that Character.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have a ::Hololive:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of the Opponent, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] For each of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] [(1)] At the start of Encore Step, if you have no other Rested Characters in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, and put them back on top of your Library in any order.

[C] If you have 3 or more cards in hand, this gets +1 Level and +700 Power.
[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may py cost. If so, choose a ::Hololive:: character or "#Hololive 0th Gen" from your Clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your Library to your Clock.

[A] When this is placed from the hand to the Stage, choose one of your Characters, and that Character gains the following ability until the next end of your Opponent's turn. "[C] This cannot be Reversed by your Opponent's [A] abilities."
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1)] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, perform the following action. "Choose a ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room, return it to hand, choose a card in your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room."

[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may move this to an empty Slot in your Front Row that has an Opponent's Character Opposite that Slot.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may Reverse that Character.

[C] If this is in the Front Row Center Slot, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have a ::Hololive:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1000, Level 1 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, reveal up to 3 cards from top of your Library. If you reveal 1 or more cards this way, choose up to 1 ::Hololive:: Characters among them, put it in your hand, put the rest in the Waiting Room, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.

[C] During your turn, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] [(1)] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 "Ayame Nakiri, Wish for a Future with You" and put it in any Slot on the Stage, and shuffle your Library.

[C] ASSIST All your Level 3 or higher Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[A] [(1) Put 1 of your other ::Hololive:: Characters from Stage in the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, draw a card, discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room, and choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return it to hand.
[S] [(1)] Choose 1 of your ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +1 Soul for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
[A] [(1) place 3 of your other Characters from Stage to Waiting Room] At the end of this card's Attack, if you are Level 3 or higher, and your Clock is 6 or more, you may pay cost. If so, Deal 3 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Hololive:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] [(2)] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] ASSIST All your ::Hololive:: Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[A] [Discard a Climax Card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When your Character reveals a Climax Card during Trigger Check, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] [(2)] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and move it to another empty Slot on your Opponent's Stage.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Hololive:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was) [A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1000 Power and ::Water::.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in Battle, you may choose a card in your Opponent's Clock and put it in the Waiting Room. If so, your Opponent puts the top card of their Library in the Clock.

[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] [Clock] SHIFT Level 0

[C] During your turn, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another "Aqua Minato, Wish for a Future with You", choose 1 of your Opponent's Front Row Characters and for the turn that Character gets -2000 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, all players perform the following action. "If you have 5 or more cards in Memory, choose 4 cards in your Memory, and put all cards in your Memory that were not chosen into your Waiting Room."
[A] When your other ::Hololive:: Character attacks, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[C] During your turn, if you have another "Shion Murasaki, Wish for a Future with You", this gains +3000 Power.
[A] When this is Front Attacked, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a Climax card, put this in the Waiting Room. (Put the revealed card back where it was)
[A] BOND/"Shion Murasaki, Wish for a Future with You" [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your ::Hololive:: Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[S] [(2) Rest this] Put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[C] ASSIST All your Level 3 or higher Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[S] [Rest this] Draw a card, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.

[C] For each of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, draw up to 1 card, and this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)
